import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import AdminDashboardForAll from "../AdminDashboardForAll"; import {FaStar, FaBackward, FaArrowDown, FaPlus} from "react-icons/fa"; import axios from "axios"; const AddBook = () =>{ let history = useHistory(); const [books, setBook] = useState({ title: "", author: "", edition: "", publisher: "", publication_date: "", copies: "", category: "", rackno: "" }); const {bk_title, bk_author, bk_edition, bk_publisher, bk_publication_date, bk_copies, bk_category, bk_rackno } = books; const inputEvent = (event) =>{ setBook({ ...books, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); } const onSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); await axios.post("http://localhost:3001/books", books); history.push("/auth/after-auth-admin/admin-dashboard/books"); }; return( <>

); } export default AddBook;
